title: Bring a Mate!
body:
{{champion:102}} " 'Cause we're having a barbeque!"
{{champion:92}}  "No we're not-"
{{champion:102}}  "And Noxians are on the menu!"
{{champion:92}}  "For fuck's sake we've been over this." 
{{champion:102}}  "You will fall before me and my Flame Breath."
{{champion:92}}  "Uh-ah, this is *not *happening again."
{{champion:102}} "Seriously, look at the picture, you are getting *roasted*."
{{champion:92}}  "IT DOES SHIT FOR DAMAGE SHYVANA. SHIT. FOR DAMAGE."
{{champion:102}} "But it does make you taste so delicious."
{{champion:92}}  "Ew."
{{champion:102}} "I just wish you would show some more skin."
{{champion:92}} "Where is this going?"
{{champion:102}} "It would make picking through your crispy remains so much easier."
{{champion:92}} "What? You wouldn't dare defile me!"
{{champion:102}}"Munch munch munch munch munch-"
{{champion:92}}  "STOP!"
